name: Bone Sword, 95cm
description: The latex Bone short sword and fantasy larp weapon that was forged using the bones from a long forgotten dragon.  The hilt has two large protruding teeth mounted on a golden frame.  The blade has bone mounted by rivets to a gold blade, tool marks are still visible showing the difficulty of creating such a formidable blade. 95cm

name: Roman Sword, 85cm
description: Celtic in style this Roman latex sword truly is a weapon to own.  This glaive is perfect in close quarter combat or in dense forest areas and caves. 85cm

name: Katana Sword, 85cm
description: Latex katana foam sword similar to the Japanese samurai weapon and intended for larp battles. 85cm. The katana is known for its efficiency and durabilty and is the trusted weapons for the samurai, ninja or any other oriental style larp character you wish to play.

name: Viking Sword, 95cm
description: The weapon of choice for any conqueror is this amazing Viking latex sword with a double tang and real leather grip. 95cm.  The short grip with real leather laces enhances the already beautiful grip.  The traditional Viking pattern pommel in the bronze finish and broad blade really makes this a great weapon for all.

name: Medium Elven Blade, 85cm
description: A slim and elegant elven latex short sword is the ideal blade for sophisticated warriors. The blade, from tip to pommel, appears as a one-piece and is colored in a quite matt steel look. 85cm

name: Assassin Sword, 85cm
description: This fantasy latex assassin sword is a weapon that every Larp thief should have. Its blade has a jagged edge to help inflict an exaggerated amount of damage to its foe. This is a short sword, it can easily be concealed beneath any cape or cloak and let’s just face it everything about this weapon just screams death. 85cm

name: Persian Sword, 85cm
description: Persian latex foam sword is the ideal Arabian larp weapon with its scimitar shaped blade is ideal for a variety of larp characters and measures 85cm.  This blade is not regular shaped and will not fit in most sword holders and was meant to be sheathed at the waist using a wide belt.

name: Leonidas Sword, 75cm
description: Greek Fantasy Latex Sword based on the Kopesh style blade measures 73cm can easily be concealed beneath your cloak or cape. This attractive latex sword is also easy to wield and is mostly used in close quater combat. It’s curved latex blade slices through its opponents with great ease and is of great use to any warrior.

name: Hellfire Sword, 90cm
description: The Hellfire latex short sword and fantasy larp weapon was created from the forges down in the bowels of the nine hells. 85cm. An eternal enchanted flame burns bright extending from the blackened grip, which strangely keeps the hand cool and the grip firm..

name: Adventurer Sword, 85cm
description: The Adventurers latex sword is a medieval fantasy larp sword designed for action packed adventures. 85cm. The blade is long and tapered near the cross guard and the handle is round and was intended for someone with small hands.
